name: Gregg Aviation
about: Gregg Aviation, located at KRNH in New Richmond, Wisconsin, is a dedicated flying school committed to providing top-notch flight training. With a focus on safety and excellence, our experienced instructors guide students through comprehensive programs tailored to achieve their aviation goals. Our state-of-the-art facilities and well-maintained fleet ensure a conducive learning environment. At Gregg Aviation, we prioritize personalized attention and a supportive community to help our students become confident and capable pilots. Our mission is to make every flight training experience both enjoyable and rewarding.
